amendment.description: An amendment to prohibit the use of funds for Hardest Hit Fund Program for any State or local government for the purpose of funding pension obligations.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Blackburn amendment (A040) Agreed to by recorded vote: 239 - 184 (Roll no. 422).

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Blackburn amendment (A040) Agreed to by recorded vote: 239 - 184 (Roll no. 422).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A040) offered by Mrs. Blackburn.
